onboarding.title: Wallet setup
onboarding.sync_desc: If you’ve already got the MetaMask extension or another wallet, sync or import it to manage your existing assets.
onboarding.create_desc: Set up your first wallet and start exploring decentralized apps.
onboarding.import: Import an existing wallet or create a new one
onboarding.optin_back_desc: Please agree or disagree to the usage of data analytics.  You can also update this option in settings.
onboarding.warning_text_1: Your current wallet and accounts will be
onboarding.warning_text_4: You can ONLY recover them with your wallet’s Secret Recovery Phrase. MetaMask cannot help you recover it.
onboarding.sync_existing: Sync your existing MetaMask wallet from the browser extension or import manually.
onboarding.scan_title: Steps to sync with MetaMask extension
onboarding.scan_step_4: Scan the QR code to start syncing

onboarding_carousel.subtitle1: Trusted by millions, MetaMask is a secure wallet making the world of web3 accessible to all.
onboarding_carousel.subtitle2: Store, spend and send digital assets like tokens, ethereum, unique collectibles.
onboarding_carousel.subtitle3: Login with MetaMask and make transactions to invest, earn, play games, sell and more!

step1.title: Welcome to your new wallet!
step1.content1: To use the blockchain, you need a wallet! Some actions cost Ether (ETH).
step1.content2: We'll show you how to buy ETH, or you can request some from a friend.

step2.title: Your Accounts
step2.content1: This is your first account, total value, and its unique public address (0x...).
step2.content2: You can create multiple accounts within this wallet by tapping on the profile icon.

step3.title: Edit Account Name
step3.content1: Why not give your account a memorable and distinct name?

step4.title: Main Menu
step4.content1: You can access Transaction history, Settings, and Support from this menu.
step4.content2: You can take more actions with your accounts & access MetaMask settings.

step5.title: Explore the Browser
step5.content1: You can explore web3 using the browser

step6.title: Search
step6.content: Search for sites, or type a URL if you know where you’re headed.

import_wallet.title: Already a MetaMask user?
import_wallet.sync_help: Sync your wallet with the extension
import_wallet.sync_help_step_four: 4. Scan the QR Code to start syncing

login.title: Welcome Back!
login.go_back: Wallet won't unlock? You can ERASE your current wallet and setup a new one
login.cant_proceed: You can’t proceed till you type the word ‘Delete’. With this action you are opting in to erase your current wallet.
login.type_delete: Type ‘%{delete}’ to erase current wallet permanently
login.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to erase your wallet?
login.your_current_wallet: Your current wallet, accounts and assets will be
login.you_can_only: You can ONLY recover this wallet with your
login.metamask_does_not: MetaMask does not have your Secret Recovery Phrase.
login.vault_error: Error: Cannot unlock without a previous vault.
login.clean_vault_error: MetaMask encountered an error due to reaching a storage limit. The local data has been corrupted. Please reinstall MetaMask and restore with your Secret Recovery Phrase.
login.security_alert_desc: In order to proceed, you need to turn Passcode on or any biometrics authentication method supported in your device (FaceID, TouchID or Fingerprint)

enter_password.title: Enter your password
enter_password.desc: Please enter your password in order to continue

choose_password.title: Create password
choose_password.subtitle: This password will unlock your MetaMask wallet only on this device.
choose_password.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
choose_password.security_alert_message: In order to proceed, you need to turn Passcode on or any biometrics authentication method supported in your device (FaceID, TouchID or Fingerprint)
choose_password.i_understand: I understand that MetaMask cannot recover this password for me.
choose_password.disable_biometric_error: You have disabled biometrics for the app. Update Remember Me settings and try again.

reset_password.title: Change password
reset_password.subtitle: This password will unlock your MetaMask wallet only on this device.
reset_password.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
reset_password.security_alert_message: In order to proceed, you need to turn Passcode on or any biometrics authentication method supported in your device (FaceID, TouchID or Fingerprint)
reset_password.i_understand: I understand that MetaMask cannot recover this password for me.
reset_password.successfully_changed: Your password has been successfully changed

import_from_seed.title: Import from seed
import_from_seed.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
import_from_seed.seed_phrase_requirements: Secret Recovery Phrases contain 12, 15, 18, 21, or 24 words
import_from_seed.invalid_qr_code_message: This QR code doesn't represent a valid Secret Recovery Phrase

drawer.submit_feedback_message: Choose the type of feedback to send.

send.title: Send
send.deeplink_failure: Something went wrong. Please try again
send.network_not_found_description: Network with chain id {{chain_id}} not found in your wallet. Please add the network first.

token_toast.tokens_hidden_desc: Hiding detected tokens from your wallet

hide_token.title: Hide Token?
hide_token.desc: You can add this token back in the future by going to “Import token” and searching for the token.

wallet.nfts_autodetection_desc: Allow MetaMask to automatically detect NFTs from OpenSea and display in your MetaMask wallet.
wallet.nfts_autodetection_cta: Turn on NFT detection in Settings
wallet.remove_token_title: Do you want to hide this token?
wallet.remove_collectible_title: Do you want to remove this collectible?
wallet.token_removal_issue_desc: There was a problem when trying to remove the token. Try again.
wallet.collectible_removed_desc: If you change your mind, you can add it back by tapping on "Import NFTs"
wallet.do_you_want_to_import_this_account: Do you want to import this account?
wallet.logout_to_import_seed: You need to log out first in order to import a Secret Recovery Phrase.
wallet.ready_to_explore: Ready to start exploring blockchain applications?

banners.search_desc: Improved token detection is currently available on {{network}} network.
banners.custom_warning_desc: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens. Learn more about
banners.custom_info_desc: Token detection is not available on this network yet. Please import token manually and make sure you trust it. Learn about

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: By proceeding, you agree to these

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.fine_print_1: This data is aggregated and is therefore anonymous for the purposes of General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679.
privacy_policy.fine_print_2a: *When you use Infura as your default RPC provider in MetaMask, Infura will collect your IP address and your Ethereum wallet address when you send a transaction. We don’t store this information in a way that allows our systems to associate those two pieces of data. You can configure your RPC provider
privacy_policy.fine_print_2b:
before proceeding.
For more information on how MetaMask and Infura interact from a data collection perspective, see our update
privacy_policy.fine_print_2c: . For more information on our privacy practices in general, see our Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description_content_1: MetaMask would like to gather usage data to better understand how our users interact with MetaMask. This data will be used to provide the service, which includes improving the service based on your use.
privacy_policy.action_description_1: Always allow you to opt-out via Settings
privacy_policy.action_description_3: collect information we don’t need to provide the service (such as keys, addresses, transaction hashes, or balances)

token.address_must_be_valid: Token address must be a valid address.
token.no_tokens_found: We couldn't find any tokens with that name.
token.address_must_be_smart_contract: Personal address detected. Enter the token contract address.

collectible.address_must_be_valid: Collectible address must be a valid address.
collectible.address_must_be_smart_contract: Personal address detected. Input the collectible contract address.
collectible.not_owner_error: You are not the owner of this collectible, so you can't add it.
collectible.ownership_verification_error: We could not verify ownership. This may be because the standard is not supported or the asset does not exist on your selected network.

accounts.remove_account_message: Do you really want to remove this account?
accounts.connect_description: Share your account address, balance, activity, and allow site to initiate transactions.

connect_qr_hardware.title: Connect a QR-based hardware wallet
connect_qr_hardware.description1: Connect an airgapped hardware wallet that communicates through QR-codes.
connect_qr_hardware.description3: Officially supported airgapped hardware wallets include:
connect_qr_hardware.description6: 2. Tap the ··· Menu, then go to Sync >

app_settings.title: Settings
app_settings.ipfs_gateway_down: Your current IPFS gateway is down
app_settings.auto_lock_desc: Choose the amount of time before the application automatically locks.
app_settings.state_logs_desc: This will help MetaMask debug any issue you might encounter. Please send it to MetaMask support via hamburger icon > Send Feedback, or reply to your existing ticket if you have one.
app_settings.clear_approvals_modal_message: All dapps will need to request access to view account information again.
app_settings.clear_browser_history_modal_message: We are about to remove all your browser history. Are you sure?
app_settings.clear_cookies_modal_message: We are about to remove your browser's cookies. Are you sure?
app_settings.reset_account_modal_message: Resetting your account will clear your transaction activity.
app_settings.invalid_rpc_prefix: URIs require the appropriate HTTPS prefix
app_settings.sync_with_extension_desc: This will import all extension accounts to this device.
app_settings.protect_desc: Protect your wallet by saving your Secret Recovery Phrase in various places like on a piece of paper, password manager and/or the cloud.
app_settings.protect_desc_no_backup: This is your wallet’s 12 word phrase. This phrase can be used to take control of all your current and future accounts, including the ability to send away funds in your wallet. Keep this phrase stored safely, DO NOT share it with anyone. MetaMask cannot help you recover this key.
app_settings.seedphrase_not_backed_up: Important! Secret Recovery Phrase not backed up
app_settings.privacy_mode_desc: Websites must request access to view your account information.
app_settings.nft_opensea_desc: Displaying NFT media & data may expose your IP address to centralized servers. Use OpenSea's API to fetch NFT data. NFT auto-detection relies on OpenSea's API, and will not be available when this is turned off. Enabling NFT auto-detection can expose you to fake NFTs being sent to your wallet by anyone, and can allow an attacker to learn your IP address from your Ethereum address.
app_settings.nft_autodetect_desc: Displaying NFT media & data may expose your IP address to centralized servers. Third-party APIs (like OpenSea) are used to detect NFTs in your wallet. This exposes your account address with those services. Leave this disabled if you don't want the app to pull data from those services.
app_settings.show_hex_data_desc: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
app_settings.custom_nonce_desc: Turn this on to change the nonce (transaction number) on confirmation screens. This is an advanced feature, use cautiously.
app_settings.accounts_identicon_desc: Jazzicons and Blockies are two different styles of unique icons that help you identify an account at a glance.
app_settings.general_desc: Currency conversion, primary currency, language and search engine
app_settings.advanced_desc: Access developer features, reset account, setup testnets, state logs, IPFS gateway and custom RPC
app_settings.contacts_desc: Add, edit, remove, and manage your accounts
app_settings.security_desc: Privacy settings, MetaMetrics, private key and wallet Secret Recovery Phrase
app_settings.networks_desc: Add and edit custom RPC networks
app_settings.remove_network_title: Do you want to remove this network?
app_settings.conversion_desc: Display fiat values in using a specific currency throughout the application.
app_settings.primary_currency_desc: Select Native to prioritize displaying values in the native currency of the chain (e.g. ETH). Select Fiat to prioritize displaying values in your selected fiat currency.
app_settings.language_desc: Translate the application to a different supported language.
app_settings.engine_desc: Change the default search engine used when entering search terms in the URL bar.
app_settings.reset_desc: This action will clear your transaction activity. This data might not be retrievable.
app_settings.rpc_desc: Use a custom RPC-capable network via URL instead of one of the provided networks.
app_settings.hex_desc: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
app_settings.clear_privacy_desc: Clear privacy data so all websites must request access to view account information again.
app_settings.clear_history_desc: Choose this option to clear your entire browsing history.
app_settings.clear_cookies_desc: Choose this option to clear your browser's cookies.
app_settings.metametrics_description: Participate in MetaMetrics to help us make MetaMask better.
app_settings.third_party_description: Third party APIs (Etherscan) are used to show your incoming transactions in the history. Turn off if you don’t want us to pull data from those services.
app_settings.metametrics_restart_required: You need to restart the app for the changes to take effect.
app_settings.invalid_password_message: The password was not correct. Please try again.
app_settings.failed_to_fetch_chain_id: Could not fetch chain ID. Is your RPC URL correct?
app_settings.endpoint_returned_different_chain_id: The endpoint returned a different chain ID: %{chainIdReturned}
app_settings.chain_id_required: The chain ID is required. It must match the chain ID returned by the network. You can enter a decimal or '0x'-prefixed hexadecimal number.
app_settings.invalid_hex_number_leading_zeros: Invalid hexadecimal number. Remove any leading zeros.
app_settings.invalid_number: Invalid number. Enter a decimal or '0x'-prefixed hexadecimal number.
app_settings.invalid_number_leading_zeros: Invalid number. Remove any leading zeros.
app_settings.invalid_number_range: Invalid number. Enter a number between 1 and %{maxSafeChainId}
app_settings.hide_zero_balance_tokens_desc: Prevents tokens with no balance from displaying in your token listing.
app_settings.token_detection_description: We use third-party APIs to detect and display new tokens sent to your wallet. Turn off if you don’t want the app to pull data from those services.
app_settings.theme_description: Change your app appearance by setting the theme.
app_settings.network_exists: This network has already been added.
app_settings.delete_metrics_description_part_one: This will delete historical MetaMetrics data associated with your wallet.
app_settings.delete_metrics_description_part_two: MetaMetrics data is anonymized usage and diagnostic data.
app_settings.delete_metrics_description_part_three: Your wallet and accounts will remain exactly as they are now after this data has been deleted. This process may take up to 60 days. View the
app_settings.delete_metrics_description_part_five: . This process can take up to 60 days. View the
app_settings.delete_metrics_confirm_modal_description: We are about to remove all your MetaMetrics data. Are you sure?
app_settings.delete_wallet_data_description: This will remove all wallet related data from your device. Your accounts exist on the blockchain and are not related to MetaMask. You can always recover your accounts using your Secret Recovery Phrase.
app_settings.delete_metrics_error_title: We are unable to delete this data right now.
app_settings.delete_metrics_error_description: This request can't be completed right now due to an analytics system server issue, please try again later.
app_settings.clear_sdk_connections_text: All connections will be cleared and dapps will need to request connection again

fiat_on_ramp.title: Buy Crypto
fiat_on_ramp.activation_keys_description: Activation Keys will enable specific features or providers.
fiat_on_ramp.paste_or_type_activation_key: Paste or type an Activation Key

seed_phrase_explanation: full access to your wallet, funds and accounts.
you are the owner of your SRP.
reveal_credential.private_key_explanation: Save it somewhere safe and secret.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning: This is the private key for the current selected account: {{accountName}}. Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private key can fully control your account, including transferring away any of your funds.
seed_phrase_warning_explanation: Make sure nobody is looking at your screen.
MetaMask Support will never request this.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning_explanation: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private key can fully control your account, including transferring away any of your funds.
reveal_credential_modal:
full access to your account and funds.

Do not share this with anyone.

full access to your wallet and funds.

Do not share this with anyone.
MetaMask Support will not request this,
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_copied_ios: Secret Recovery Phrase temporarily copied to clipboard
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_copied_android: Secret Recovery Phrase copied to clipboard
reveal_credential.private_key_copied: Private key temporarily copied to clipboard
reveal_credential.private_key_copied_ios: Private key temporarily copied to clipboard
reveal_credential.unknown_error: Couldn't unlock your account. Please try again.
reveal_credential.hardware_error: This is a hardware wallet account, you cannot export your private key.
reveal_credential.seed_warning: This is your wallet's 12 word phrase. This phrase can be used to take control of all of your current and future accounts, including the ability to send away any of their funds. Keep this phrase stored safely, DO NOT share it with anyone.

screenshot_deterrent.title: Safety alert
screenshot_deterrent.description: Screenshots aren't a safe way to keep track of your {{credentialName}}. Store it somewhere that isn't backed up online to keep your account safe.

password_reset.password_desc: Choose a strong password to unlock MetaMask app on your device. If you lose this password, you will need your Secret Recovery Phrase to re-import your wallet.

import.title: Import selected tokens?
import.desc: Only the tokens you've selected will appear in your wallet. You can always import hidden tokens later by searching for them.

hide.title: Are you sure?
hide.desc: If you hide tokens, they will not be shown in your wallet. However, you can still add them by searching for them.

qr_scanner.invalid_qr_code_message: The QR code that you are trying to scan it is not valid.
qr_scanner.allow_camera_dialog_message: We need your permission to scan QR codes
qr_scanner.attempting_to_scan_with_wallet_locked: Looks like you're trying to scan a QR code, you need to unlock your wallet to be able to use it.
qr_scanner.attempting_sync_from_wallet_error:
Looks like you're trying to sync with the extension. In order to do so, you will need to erase your current wallet. 

Once you've erased or reinstalled a fresh version of the app, select the option to "Sync with MetaMask Extension". Important! Before erasing your wallet, make sure you've backed up your Secret Recovery Phrase.
qr_scanner.not_allowed_error_desc: Camera access needed to scan a QR code associated with an account address or a contract address
qr_scanner.unrecognized_address_qr_code_desc: Sorry, this QR code is not associated with an account address or a contract address.
qr_scanner.url_redirection_alert_title: You are about to visit  an external link
qr_scanner.url_redirection_alert_desc: Links can be used to try to defraud or phish people, so make sure to only visit websites that you trust.

transaction.this_is_an_advanced: This is an advanced feature used to cancel or speed up any pending transactions.
transaction.think_of_the_nonce: Think of the nonce as the transaction number of an account. Every account's nonce begins with 0 for the first transaction and continues in sequential order.
transaction.nonce_warning: Warning: You may encounter issues with future transactions if you continue. Use with caution.
transaction.insufficient_amount: You need {{amount}} more {{tokenSymbol}} to complete this transaction.
transaction.high_gas_price: Your gas fee may be set unnecessarily high ({{currentGasPrice}}). Consider lowering the amount.
transaction.approve_warning: By approving this action, you grant permission for this contract to spend up to
transaction.cancel_tx_message: Submitting this attempt does not guarantee your original transaction will be cancelled. If the cancellation attempt is successful, you will be charged the transaction fee above.
transaction.speedup_tx_message: Submitting this attempt does not guarantee your original transaction will be accelerated. If the speed up attempt is successful, you will be charged the transaction fee above.
transaction.not_enough_for_gas: You have 0 {{ticker}} in your account to pay for transaction fees. Buy some {{ticker}} or deposit from another account.
transaction.tokenContractAddressWarning_3: . If you send tokens to this address, you will lose them.
transaction.smartContractAddressWarning: This address is a smart contract address. Please make sure you understand what this address is for, otherwise you risk losing your funds.
transaction.gas_education_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
transaction.gas_education_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
transaction.gas_education_4: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexitity.
transaction.confusable_msg: We have detected a confusable character in the ENS name. Check the ENS name to avoid a potential scam.
transaction.dapp_suggested_gas: This gas fee has been suggested by %{origin}. It’s using legacy gas estimation which may be inaccurate. However, editing this gas fee may cause a problem with your transaction. Please reach out to %{origin} if you have questions.
transaction.dapp_suggested_eip1559_gas: This gas fee has been suggested by %{origin}. Overriding this may cause a problem with your transaction. Please reach out to %{origin} if you have questions.
transaction.ens_not_found: No address has been set for this name.
transaction.invalid_qr_code_sync: Invalid QR code. Please scan the sync QR code of the hardware wallet.
transaction.no_camera_permission: Camera not authorized. Please give permission and retry
transaction.invalid_qr_code_sign: Invalid QR code. Please check your hardware and retry.
transaction.no_camera_permission_android: You need to grant MetaMask access to your camera to proceed. You may also need to change your system settings.
transaction.mismatched_qr_request_id: Incongruent transaction data. Please use your Keystone to sign the QR code below and tap 'Get Signature'.
transaction.invalid_recipient_description: Check the address and make sure it's valid

custom_gas.warning_gas_limit: Gas limit must be greater than 20999
custom_gas.warning_gas_limit_estimated: Estimated gas limit is {{gas}}, use it as minimum value
custom_gas.cost_explanation: The gas fee covers the cost of processing your transaction on the Ethereum network. MetaMask does not profit from this fee. The higher the fee the better chances of your transaction getting processed.

spend_limit_edition.title: Edit permission
spend_limit_edition.allow_explanation: to withdraw and spend up to the following amount:
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_site: By granting permission, you're allowing the following contract to access your funds.
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_address: Do you trust this address? By granting this permission, you're allowing this address to access your funds.
spend_limit_edition.transaction_fee_explanation: A transaction fee is associated with this permission.
spend_limit_edition.details_explanation: {{host}} may access and spend up to this max amount from this account.
spend_limit_edition.all_set_desc: You’ve successfully set permissions for this site.

browser.title: Browser
browser.dapp_browser_message: MetaMask is your wallet and browser for the decentralized web. Have a look around!
browser.no_tabs_desc: To browse the decentralized web, add a new tab
browser.failed_to_resolve_ens_name: We couldn't resolve that ENS name
browser.remove_bookmark_msg: Do you really want to remove this site from your favorites?

protocol_alerts.tel: This website has been blocked from automatically making a phone call
protocol_alerts.mailto: This website has been blocked from automatically composing an email.
protocol_alerts.generic: This website has been blocked from automatically opening an external application

transactions.import_wallet_tip: All future transactions made from this device will include a label "from this device" next to the timestamp. For transactions dated before adding the account, this history will not indicate which outgoing transactions originated from this device.
transactions.sign_description_1: After you have signed with Keystone,

address_book.add_this_address: Add this address to your address book
address_book.name: Name

sync_with_extension.title: Sync data from Extension
sync_with_extension.label: Open the MetaMask extension in your desktop browser, then go to "Settings" > "Advanced", click on "Sync with Mobile" and then enter your password to see the QR Code
sync_with_extension.please_wait: Please wait while we sync your data...
sync_with_extension.error_message: Something went wrong... Please try again
sync_with_extension.warning_message: This will override all your current accounts and transaction activity in your mobile phone. Are you sure?
sync_with_extension.invalid_qr_code_desc: This isn't the right QR code! To sync with your browser extension, go to "Settings" > "Advanced" > Sync with Mobile in the browser extension and scan the QR there
sync_with_extension.outdated_qr_code_desc: This seems to be an expired QR code!  Please try scanning a new one
sync_with_extension.something_wrong_desc: We are having issues while trying to sync your wallet. Please try again later or import your wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase
sync_with_extension.allow_biometrics_desc: You can use {{biometrics}} to authenticate on MetaMask

sync_with_extension_success.title: Wallet imported
sync_with_extension_success.sync_complete_1: Just remember, MetaMask cannot recover your Secret Recovery Phrase should you lose it. You can find the Secret Recovery Phrase in
sync_with_extension_success.password_tip: The password to unlock your mobile wallet is the same one you set for the extension.

networks.title: Networks
networks.status_not_ok: The network is having some issues
networks.network_infomation: This allows this network to be used within MetaMask
networks.network_endorsement: MetaMask does not endorse custom networks or their security.
networks.malicious_network_warning: A malicious network provider can lie about the state of the blockchain and record your network activity. Only add custom networks you trust.
networks.network_warning_desc: This network connection relies on third parties. This connection may be less reliable or enable third-parties to track activity.
networks.network_added: is now available in the network selector.
networks.provider: A provider is trusted to tell your wallet its balances and to broadcast its transactions faithfully
networks.empty_popular_networks: You’ve added all the popular networks. You can discover more networks
networks.deprecated_network_msg: Due to the protocol changes of Ethereum: Rinkeby, Ropsten, Kovan test networks may not work as reliably and will be deprecated soon.

signature_request.title: Signature Request
signature_request.eth_sign_warning: Signing this message can be dangerous. This signature could potentially perform any operation on your account's behalf, including granting complete control of your account and all of its assets to the requesting site. Only sign this message if you know what you're doing or completely trust the requesting site.

watch_asset_request.title: Add Suggested Token
watch_asset_request.message: Would you like to add this token?

authentication.auth_prompt_desc: Please authenticate in order to use MetaMask
authentication.fingerprint_prompt_desc: Use your fingerprint to unlock MetaMask

accountApproval.title: CONNECT REQUEST
accountApproval.warning: By clicking connect, you allow this dapp to view your public address. This is an important security step to protect your data from potential phishing risks.

import_private_key.title: Import Account
import_private_key.description_one: Imported accounts are viewable in your wallet but are not recoverable with your MetaMask Secret Recovery Phrase.
import_private_key.learn_more_here: Learn more about imported accounts here.
import_private_key.subtitle: Paste your private key string
import_private_key.error_message: We couldn't import that private key. Please make sure you entered it correctly.
import_private_key.error_empty_message: You need to enter your private key.

import_private_key_success.title: Account successfully imported!
import_private_key_success.description_one: You'll now be able to view your account in MetaMask.

secure_your_wallet.title: Secure your wallet
secure_your_wallet.info_text_1: Take a few moments to finish setting up your MetaMask wallet.
secure_your_wallet.info_text_2: This will ensure only you can access your funds and will let you recover your wallet if you lose your device

account_backup_step_1.title: Secure your wallet
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_1: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_4: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
account_backup_step_1.skip_check: I understand that if I lose my Secret Recovery Phrase I will not be able to access my wallet.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_1: A Secret Recovery Phrase is a set of twelve words that contains all the information about your wallet, including your funds. It’s like a secret code used to access your entire wallet.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_2: You must keep your Secret Recovery Phrase secret and safe. If someone gets your Secret Recovery Phrase, they’ll gain control over your accounts.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_3: Save it in a place where only you can access it. If you lose it, not even MetaMask can help you recover it.

account_backup_step_1B.title: Secure your wallet
account_backup_step_1B.manual_subtitle: Write down your Secret Recovery Phrase on a piece of paper and store in a safe place.
account_backup_step_1B.risks_2: You forget where you put it
account_backup_step_1B.other_options: Other options: Doesn’t have to be paper!
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_1: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your Secret Recovery Phrase in a place you trust.
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_2: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.

account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_2.title: Grab a pen and paper
account_backup_step_2.info: Next step is to write your Secret Recovery Phrase down.

account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_3.title: Is anyone watching?
account_backup_step_3.info_text: Make sure no other human or robot is watching your screen. If your Secret Recovery Phrase is copied, it can be used on other devices to steal your funds

account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_4.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_4.info_text_1: Carefully write down these words on paper. Their order matters.
account_backup_step_4.info_text_2: You'll be asked to re-enter it on the next screen
account_backup_step_4.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

account_backup_step_5.error_message: The order of the words is incorrect. Please make sure you wrote it down correctly and go to the previous screen if it is necessary
account_backup_step_5.title: Confirm Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_5.info_text: Insert each word in the order it was presented to you on the previous screen.
account_backup_step_5.modal_text: This was to ensure you follow this security measure

account_backup_step_6.title: Security Tips
account_backup_step_6.info_text: MetaMask cannot recover your Secret Recovery Phrase if you lose it
account_backup_step_6.tip_1: Keep multiple backups of your Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_6.tip_2: Store the phrase in a trusted password manager and paper backups in a safe place
account_backup_step_6.tip_3: Never share this phrase with anyone
account_backup_step_6.disclaimer: * You can find your Secret Recovery Phrase if you go to
account_backup_step_6.modal_text: You are all backed up and ready to go!
account_backup_step_6.copy_seed_phrase: COPY Secret Recovery Phrase TO CLIPBOARD

manual_backup_step_1.action: Write down your Secret Recovery Phrase
manual_backup_step_1.info: This is your Secret Recovery Phrase. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
manual_backup_step_1.reveal: Tap to reveal your Secret Recovery Phrase
manual_backup_step_1.watching: Make sure no one is watching your screen.
manual_backup_step_1.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

manual_backup_step_2.info: Select each word in the order it was presented to you.

manual_backup_step_3.success: You’ve successfully protected your wallet. Remember to keep your Secret Recovery Phrase safe, it's your responsibility!
manual_backup_step_3.recover: MetaMask cannot recover your wallet should you lose it. You can find your Secret Recovery Phrase in Settings > Security & Privacy.
manual_backup_step_3.leave_hint: Leave yourself a hint. Write the location / where you saved it to remind yourself how you can access it. This information does not leave your device.
manual_backup_step_3.no_seedphrase: Do not use this to write your Secret Recovery Phrase.

phishing.intro: is currently on the MetaMask domain warning list. This means that based on information available to us, MetaMask believes this domain could currently compromise your security and, as an added safety feature, MetaMask has restricted access to the site. To override this, please read the rest of this warning for instructions on how to continue at your own risk.
phishing.reasons: There are many reasons sites can appear on our warning list, and our warning list compiles from other widely used industry lists. Such reasons can include known fraud or security risks, such as domains that test positive on the
phishing.list_content: Domains on these warning lists may include outright malicious websites and legitimate websites that have been compromised by a malicious actor.
phishing.to_read_more: To read more about this site
phishing.review_on_etherscam: please review the domain on Etherscam.
phishing.warning: Note that this warning list is compiled on a voluntary basis. This list may be inaccurate or incomplete. Just because a domain does not appear on this list is not an implicit guarantee of that domain's safety. As always, your transactions are your own responsibility. If you wish to interact with any domain on our warning list, you can do so by
phishing.file_an_issue_intro: If you think this domain is incorrectly flagged or if a blocked legitimate website has resolved its security issues,

notifications.purchase_cancelled_description: Verify your payment method and card support

step_1.title: Before you purchase {{ticker}}, understand gas fees
step_1.subtitle_1: If you plan to swap or transfer your {{ticker}}, purchase extra to cover gas fees.
step_1.subtitle_2: Gas fees for transactions are separate from the cost of purchasing {{ticker}}.
step_1.subtitle_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_2.title: What are gas fees?
step_2.subtitle_1: Gas powers transactions on the Ethereum network. It’s a fee paid in {{ticker}} to the crypto miners who process your transactions.
step_2.subtitle_2: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_3.title: How much do I need?
step_3.subtitle_1: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and type of transaction.
step_3.subtitle_2: A complex transaction like “swapping” may cost 5x - 10x more than a “send” transaction.
step_3.subtitle_3: The best way to estimate gas fees is to
step_3.subtitle_5: and see how much gas costs.

onboarding.best_quotes: Our buy crypto feature aggregates quotes from integrated vendors, providing you the best quote from those sources for you to get crypto directly into your wallet with no waiting period.
onboarding.benefits: Less gas fees to pay, and numerous networks, tokens, and payment methods supported

payment_method.no_payment_methods_description:
There are currently no supported payment methods in your region. Please check by soon; we are frequently expanding support to new regions.

If you selected {{regionName}} by mistake, click the button below to reset your region.

fiat_on_ramp_aggregator.request_new_quotes: Please request new quotes to get the latest best rate.
fiat_on_ramp_aggregator.select_a_cryptocurrency_description: Select from the list of tokens available on {{network}}.
fiat_on_ramp_aggregator.buy_from_vetted: To buy {{ticker}} from one of our integrations, you’ll be securely taken to their portal without leaving the MetaMask app
fiat_on_ramp_aggregator.try_different_amount_to_buy_input: Try choosing a different payment method or try to increase or reduce the amount you want to buy!
fiat_on_ramp_aggregator.no_tokens_available: There are currently no tokens available to purchase on {{network}} with the selected payment method.

region.title: Select your Region
region.description: The payment methods and tokens available to you are determined by our third-party integrations and may vary depending on your region and support by our integrations.
region.select_country_registered: Select the country where your card is registered (regardless of where you are located).
region.unsupported_description: We are working hard to expand coverage to your region as soon as we can. In the meantime, see our support article for other ways you may be able to buy crypto.

order_details.available_in_account: is now available in your account
order_details.failed_description: Something went wrong, and {{provider}} was unable to complete your order. Please try again or with another provider.
order_details.processing_card_description: Credit/Debit purchases typically take a few minutes
order_details.processing_bank_description: Bank transfers typically take a few business days

swaps.feature_off_body: MetaMask Swaps is undergoing maintenance. Please check back later.
swaps.wrong_network_body: You’re only able to swap tokens on the Ethereum Main Network.
swaps.unallowed_asset_body: Some tokens with unique mechanics are currently not supported for swapping.
swaps.verify_on: Always verify the token address on
swaps.added_manually: This token has been added manually.
swaps.make_sure_trade: and make sure this is the token you want to trade.
swaps.token_multiple: Multiple tokens can use the same name and symbol.
swaps.token_to_verify: to verify this is the token you're looking for.
swaps.manually_pasting: Manually add a token by pasting its address.
swaps.token_address_can_be_found: Token contract addresses can be found on
swaps.error_gathering_token_details: Oops, there was an error gathering token details.
swaps.add_warning: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects.
swaps.not_enough: Not enough {{symbol}} to complete this swap
swaps.slippage_info: If the rate changes between the time your order is placed and confirmed it’s called “slippage”. Your Swap will automatically cancel if slippage exceeds your “max slippage” setting.
swaps.slippage_warning: Make sure you know what you’re doing!
swaps.more_gas_to_complete: more for gas to complete this swap.
swaps.market_price_unavailable: Market price is unavailable and price impact is therefore unknown. Please verify that you are comfortable with the amount of tokens you will receive before swapping.
swaps.price_difference_body: The difference in market prices can be affected by fees taken by intermediaries, size of market, size of trade, or market inefficiencies.
swaps.price_impact_body: Price impact is the difference between the current market price and the amount received during transaction execution. Price impact is a function of the size of your trade relative to the size of the liquidity pool.
swaps.quotes_update_often_text: Quotes are updated often to reflect current market conditions.

fee_text.fee_is_applied: The fee of {{fee}} is automatically factored into this quote. You pay it in exchange for a license to use MetaMask's liquidity provider information aggregation software.
fee_text.fee_is_not_applied: MetaMask does not include an additional fee in this quote.

quote_source_dex.1: This quote comes directly from a

quote_source_rfq.3: who responds with a quote directly.

quote_source_agg.3: which finds the best price by splitting your order between different decentralized exchanges.

quote_source_cnt.1: This quote comes directly from a
quote_source_cnt.3: that wraps and unwraps native tokens which can save on gas costs.

swaps.request_new_quotes: Please request new quotes to get the latest best rate.
swaps.try_adjusting: Try adjusting the amount and try again.
swaps.unexpected_error: There has been an unexpected error, please request new quotes to get the latest best rate. (error: {{error}})
swaps.medium_selected_warning: Swaps are time sensitive. “Medium” is not reccomended.
swaps.high_recommendation: Swaps are typically time sensitive. “High” will help avoid potential losses due to changes in market conditions.
swaps.gas_education_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
swaps.gas_education_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
swaps.gas_education_6: is what we expect the actual fee to be. The exact amount depends on network conditions.
swaps.gas_education_8: is the most you’ll spend. When the network is volatile this can be a large amount.

protect_wallet_modal.title: Protect your wallet
protect_wallet_modal.text: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your Secret Recovery Phrase in a place you trust.
protect_wallet_modal.text_bold: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.

error_screen.title: An error occured
error_screen.subtitle: Your information can't be shown. Don’t worry, your wallet and funds are safe.
error_screen.submit_ticket_1: Please report this issue so we can fix it:
error_screen.submit_ticket_2: Take a screenshot of this screen.
error_screen.submit_ticket_7: Please include the error message and the screenshot.
error_screen.save_seedphrase_3: & re-install the app. Note: you can NOT restore your wallet without your Secret Recovery Phrase.

whats_new.title: See what's new
whats_new.feature_token_detection_description:
Improved token detection is currently available on Ethereum Mainnet, Polygon, BSC, and Avalanche network. More to come!

We source tokens from 3rd party tokens lists. Tokens listed on more than two token lists will be automatically detected.

Token detection feature is ON by default. But you can disable it from Settings.
whats_new.feature_token_security_description_1: Tokens can be created by anyone and can have duplicate names. If you see a token appear that you don’t trust or haven’t interacted with - its safer to not trust it.
whats_new.feature_token_security_description_2: On MetaMask mobile app, you can always hide tokens by long pressing on the token, and select ‘Hide’.

invalid_network.message: To protect you from malicious or faulty network providers, chain IDs are now required for all custom networks.
invalid_network.hint: You can find the chain IDs of most popular networks on

switch_custom_network.switch_warning: This will switch the selected network within MetaMask to a prevously added network:
switch_custom_network.available: is now available in the network selector.

add_custom_network.title: Allow this site to add a network?
add_custom_network.warning: This allows this network to be used within MetaMask.
add_custom_network.warning_subtext_1: MetaMask does not verify custom networks or their security.
add_custom_network.unrecognized_chain: This custom network is not recongized
add_custom_network.invalid_chain: The %{rpcUrl} for this Chain ID does not match the chainid.network listing

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.swaps_warning: Swaps are very time sensitive. “High” will help avoid potential loses due to changes in market conditions.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.priority_fee_at_least_0_error: Priority fee must be at least 1 GWEI

learn_more.title: How should I choose?
learn_more.intro: Selecting the right gas fee depends on the type of transaction and how important it is to you.
learn_more.aggressive_text: High probability, even in volatile markets. Use Aggressive to cover surges in network traffic due to things like popular NFT drops.
learn_more.market_text: Use Market for fast processing at current market price.
learn_more.low_text: Use Low to wait for a cheaper price. Time estimates are much less accurate as prices are somewhat unpredictable.

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_low: Max Priority Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_high: Max Priority Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_speed_up_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_cancel_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_low: Max Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_high: Max Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_speed_up_low: Max Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_cancel_low: Max Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Max priority fee” and “Max fee”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_priority_fee: Max priority fee (aka “miner tip”) goes directly to miners and incentivizes them to prioritize your transaction. You’ll most often pay your max setting.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_fee: The max fee is the most you’ll pay (base fee + priority fee).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_new_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 10% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_cancel_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 50% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.low_fee_warning: Take note of your processing time. Future transactions will queue after this one.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit_legacy: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Gas price”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_price: This network requires a “Gas price” field when submitting a transaction. Gas price is the maximum amount you are willing to pay per unit of gas.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_low: Gas price is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_high: Gas price is higher than necessary

transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_4: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_5: Gas fees are set by the network and fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexity.
transaction_review_eip1559.legacy_gas_suggestion_tooltip: This gas fee suggestion is using legacy gas estimation which may be inaccurate.

times_eip1559.warning_unknown: Your max fee or max priority fee may be low for current market conditions. We don’t know when (or if) your transaction will be processed.
times_eip1559.warning_low: This lowers your maximum fee but if network traffic increases your transaction may be delayed or fail.

network_information.third_description: Your tokens may not automatically show up in your wallet.

network_information.add_token: Click here to manually add the tokens
network_information.error_message: There was an error loading the network information. Please try again later.
network_information.private_network_third_description: Please enter a name for this network to make it easy to identify.
network_information.token_detection_mainnet_title: Token detection is enabled so tokens will automatically show up in your wallet.
network_information.token_detection_mainnet_link: You can also add tokens manually.

remember_me.enable_remember_me_description: When Remember me is on, anyone with access to your phone can access your MetaMask account.

turn_off_remember_me.title: Enter your password to turn off Remember me
turn_off_remember_me.description: If you turn this option off, you'll need your password to unlock MetaMask from now on.

dapp_connect.warning: In order to use this feature, please update the app to the newest version

automatic_security_checks.title: Automatic security checks
automatic_security_checks.description: Automatically checking for updates may expose your IP address to GitHub servers. This only indicates that your IP address is using MetaMask. No other information or account addresses are exposed.

update_needed.title: Updates needed
update_needed.description: We've increased security for your wallet! Please take a moment to protect yourself and update to the latest version.

enable_automatic_security_check_modal.title: Automatically check for security updates?
enable_automatic_security_check_modal.description: Automatically checking for updates may expose your IP address to GitHub servers. This only indicates that your IP address is using MetaMask. No other information or account addresses are exposed.

custom_spend_cap.title: Custom spending cap
custom_spend_cap.no_value_selected: Only enter a number that you're comfortable with {{domain}} accessing now or in the future. You can always increase the token limit later.
custom_spend_cap.this_contract_allows: This contract allows the site to spend
custom_spend_cap.future_tokens: you might have in the future. Your tokens may be at risk.
custom_spend_cap.info_modal_description_default: The contract could spend your entire token balance without further notice or consent. Protect yourself by setting a lower spending cap.

restore_wallet.restore_needed_description: Something has gone wrong but don’t worry! Let’s try to restore your wallet.

wallet_restored.wallet_restored_description_part_one: You may need to add some of your assets, networks, and settings again manually.
wallet_restored.wallet_restored_description_link: back up your Secret Recovery Phrase
wallet_restored.wallet_restored_description_part_three: in case you need to restore your wallet again in the future.

new_wallet_needed.new_wallet_needed_description_part_one: Something's wrong with your wallet, and you'll need to create a new one. Because your accounts are on the blockchain, they're still safe. Only the preferences, saved networks, account names, and related data saved on your device are gone.
new_wallet_needed.new_wallet_needed_description_part_two: To import your accounts to a new wallet, you'll need your Secret Recovery Phrase. If you don't have your Secret Recovery Phrase, you won't be able to import your accounts.
new_wallet_needed.new_wallet_needed_description_part_three: To keep this from happening again, be sure to always keep your MetaMask app and OS updated to the latest version.

srp_security_quiz.title: Security quiz
srp_security_quiz.introduction: To reveal your Secret Recovery Phrase, you need to correctly answer two questions

question_one.question: If you lose your Secret Recovery Phrase, MetaMask...
question_one.wrong_answer: Can get it back for you
question_one.right_answer_title: Right! No one can help get your Secret Recovery Phrase back
question_one.right_answer_description: Write it down, engrave it on metal, or keep it in multiple secret spots so you never lose it. If you lose it, it’s gone forever.
question_one.wrong_answer_title: Wrong! No one can help get your Secret Recovery Phrase back
question_one.wrong_answer_description: If you lose your Secret Recovery Phrase, it’s gone forever. No one can help you get it back, no matter what they might say.

question_two.question: If anyone, even a support agent, asks for your Secret Recovery Phrase...
question_two.right_answer_title: Correct! Sharing your Secret Recovery Phrase is never a good idea
question_two.right_answer_description: Anyone claiming to need your Secret Recovery Phrase is lying to you. If you share it with them, they will steal your assets.
question_two.wrong_answer: You should give it to them
question_two.wrong_answer_title: Nope! Never share your Secret Recovery Phrase with anyone, ever
question_two.wrong_answer_description: Anyone claiming to need your Secret Recovery Phrase is lying to you. If you share it with them, they will steal your assets.
